markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Grouloop](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1684)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 36

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Grouloop](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1684)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=207" />
<trait label="Boggard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=209" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 33

**Perception** +18; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Boggard](/Languages.aspx?ID=27)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +17, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +16, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +18, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +18, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +18

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +0

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
bag of dead dragonflies, [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Sickle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=9)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +21 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 185

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, swim 25 feet; swamp stride

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sickle +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tongue +20 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 bludgeoning and Tongue Grab

**Primal Spontaneous Spells** DC 28, attack +20
- **Cantrips (5th)**
[Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
- **1st**
[Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122), [Grease](/Spells.aspx?ID=140), [Mending](/Spells.aspx?ID=189) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59), [Water Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=371), [Web](/Spells.aspx?ID=374) (3 slots)
- **3rd**
[Animal Vision](/Spells.aspx?ID=12), [Glyph of Warding](/Spells.aspx?ID=138), [Stinking Cloud](/Spells.aspx?ID=309) (3 slots)
- **4th**
[Acid Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [Summon Elemental](/Spells.aspx?ID=320) (3 slots)
- **5th**
[Cloudkill](/Spells.aspx?ID=42), [Hydraulic Torrent](/Spells.aspx?ID=155) (2 slots)

**Rituals** DC 28

- **2nd**
[Consecrate](/Rituals.aspx?ID=8) (2nd)
- **6th**
[Primal Call](/Rituals.aspx?ID=19) (6th)

**Soul-Shaking Croak** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)) Grouloop utters a powerful croak that deals 6d10 sonic damage to any non-[boggard](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=16) within a 30-foot emanation (DC 27 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save). A creature with the [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition that fails its saving throw increases its frightened condition by 1 (on a critical failure, the creature is also [fleeing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=17) for as long as it is frightened). Grouloop can't use Soul-Shaking Croak again for 1d4 rounds.

**Swamp Stride**   Grouloop ignores difficult terrain caused by swamp terrain features.

**Tongue Grab**   If Grouloop hits a creature with her tongue, that creature becomes [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20). Unlike with a normal grab, the creature isn't [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24), but it can't move beyond the reach of Grouloop's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue by hitting AC 24 and dealing at least 9 slashing damage. Though this doesn't deal any damage to the boggard, it prevents her from using her tongue Strike until she regrows her tongue, which takes a week.

</column>
name: Grouloop

---

</summary>

A creature with the frightened condition that fails its saving throw increases its frightened condition by 1 (on a critical failure, the creature is also fleeing for as long as it is frightened). Grouloop can't use Soul-Shaking Croak again for 1d4 rounds. Swamp Stride Grouloop ignores difficult terrain caused by swamp terrain features. Tongue Grab If Grouloop hits a creature with her tongue, that creature becomes grabbed. Unlike with a normal grab, the creature isn't immobilized, but it can't move beyond the reach of Grouloop's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue by hitting AC 24 and dealing at least 9 slashing damage. Though this doesn't deal any damage to the boggard, it prevents her from using her tongue Strike until she regrows her tongue, which takes a week.
